msg.msgText: The client failed because it received data from the server that was not the correct length ({0}). This can happen if Message Gateway closes the connection (for example, during shut down), or if Message Gateway is down. It can also occur due to network problems.

msgExplanation.p: A read failure occurred because the JMS client received data that was not the correct length.

msgUserResponse.p: If Message Gateway is stopped, normal behavior resumes after it is restarted. If Message Gateway is not stopped, contact your network administrator for assistance.
